subject: World Series
lead_paragraph: It is good to be Evan Longoria. Good to be 23 years old, good to be perhaps the best rookie in the American League and good to be playing in a World Series in your first season.
snippet: It is good to be Evan Longoria. Good to be 23 years old, good to be perhaps the best rookie in the American League and good to be playing in a World Series in your first season.
